entry.title: first post: announcement!
entry.content:
I’m Martha. I’m a developer for Cheezburger Network (I Can Has Cheezburger, Failblog, Memebase, Know Your Meme). Well, at least I will be until June. I’ve been accepted into the summer batch of Hacker School and graciously given a grant from Etsy. Their goal is to make me “a significantly better programmer.” My goal is to exceed their expectations :)

Never graduate ;)
Martha
